item.title: Intro
item.description: HIS HOLINESS SRIK LKI’S Sahasra-Gatha-Ratnavali. A Sanskrit Metrical Version OF Saint Sathari’s Tiruvaymoli. (Containing 1102 stanzas) Saint Sathari or Nammal war belonged to the fourth (Sudra) caste by birth, and his Extreme Love of God (Love of Lord Sri. Krishna) made him pour fourth his nectareous streams of excellent Tamil (Sacred) verses called Tiruvaymoli (Divya-Prabandha)-by the Blessings of God–for the Elevation and Salvation of all souls, irrespective of caste or creed, kind or sex, to whatever race or nation they may belong !
